definition: to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: It's configured to perform recursion or use a forwarder.
sentences.chinese: 它被配置来执行递归或者使用转发器。

sentences.english: The second request also involved forwarding mail to a specific server.
sentences.chinese: 第二个需求也涉及把邮件转发到特定的服务器。

sentences.english: After consulting the LIB , the MPLS node forwards the packet toward its destination.
sentences.chinese: 之后，MPLS节点将包转发给它的目的地。
默认的模式是存储转发。

sentences.english: And also can assign the forwarded number or record the greeting of answering machine remotely.
sentences.chinese: 也可以指定转发的数量或记录答录机远程问候。

sentences.english: COTM applications using transponded satellite architectures.
sentences.chinese: 使用卫星转发架构的COTM应用。

sentences.english: Tens of millions of weibo posts are created and reposted each day in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，每天产生数以千万计原创或转发的微博帖子。

sentences.english: This article contains attachments. Do you want them to be forwarded as well?
sentences.chinese: 该文章包含了附件。您想同时转发附件吗？

sentences.english: The MPLS network technology data retransmission relies on label.
sentences.chinese: MPLS网络技术的数据转发依赖于标签。

sentences.english: Which command is used to configure a subinterface that will forward broadcasts and routing updates?
sentences.chinese: 如何配置子接口转发广播和路由更新？

sentences.english: He asked Twitter users not to re-post the messages.
sentences.chinese: 他要求Twitter用户不要再转发这类信息。

sentences.english: My report will list top retweeters, sorted from most to least.
sentences.chinese: 我的报告列示最多的转发，从多到少进行排序。

sentences.english: Delete chaine-mails and junk email. Do not forward or reply to any of them.
sentences.chinese: 把连锁信和垃圾邮件统统删除，不要转发或者回复。

sentences.english: And send it also to men, because sometimes they need to remember these facts.
sentences.chinese: 也请转发给男性友人，提醒他们女人的伟大。

sentences.english: Forwarding, on the other hand, is transparent to the end user.
sentences.chinese: 转发却不这样，它对最终用户是透明的。

sentences.english: NASA retweeted her photo and media requests began pouring in.
sentences.chinese: 美国宇航局转发了她的图片，媒体采访跟着蜂拥而至。

definition: to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
to comment on/to discuss/comment/commentary/CL:篇[pian1]
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
article/essay/literary works/writings/hidden meaning/CL:篇[pian1],段[duan4],頁|页[ye4]
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
variant of 贊|赞[zan4]
variant of 贊|赞[zan4]/to praise
to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
variant of 讚|赞[zan4]
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
to share (let others have some of sth good)
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
server push (computing)
microblogging/microblog
to thank/thanks/thank you
screenshot (computing)
